content: Hello all, I'm a developer with the Crucible testing tool, and I'm working on updating our Connectathon Scheduling test suite to support Connectathon 12. The specification for the Scheduling track for Connectathon 12 track (http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=201605_ServicesDirectoryAndScheduling_Track) specifies searching a Directory on a FHIR server as one of the first steps, but there isn't a Directory Resource in FHIR. Is Directory meant to be a stand-in term for Practitioner/HealthcareService, or is it meant to be a Directory resource that I don't know about?
I will try and update the track description to be more clear about this in the next day or so.
